text: Aleksandr Nikolayevich Tikhonov (; born 21 November 1963) is a former Russian football player and coach. ==External links== * Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet footballers Category:FC Rostov players Category:Russian footballers Category:Russian Premier League players Category:Russian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Finland Category:FC SKA Rostov-on-Don players Category:Association football forwards
title: Aleksandr Tikhonov (footballer)
